article_title: The federal budget for all to see - The Intelligencer: Bucks County
article_text:
The content you are attempting to view is more than 24 hours old. If you’re already a subscriber to The Intelligencer please log-in below.

If you’re not a subscriber, you can subscribe now for the first month for just 99 cents! Select Subscribe to get started.

og.description: With the media focused so heavily on the presidential election, perhaps it's not surprising that few are paying attention as Congress takes up its annual spending bills. Besides, President Barack Obama has said for years that our budget deficit is lessening, so we shouldn't worry about it anymore, right?
